name: Execute: Enhanced Learning
desc: After ally targets use their Ultimate to attack Weakness Broken enemies, delay the enemy's action by 16%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s).
enhanced_desc: After ally targets use their Ultimate to attack Weakness Broken enemies, delay the enemy's action by 24%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s).
